name: Call of Duty: Black Ops - First Strike
name_original: Call of Duty: Black Ops - First Strike
description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops - First Strike is an action-shooter game developed by Treyarch. It came out on 01-02-2011. Activision Blizzard published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Call of Duty: Black Ops - First Strike is available on Xbox 360, PC and PlayStation 3.
